Frame:Game

From EN MetaNet Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Name Gloss Game
Transcription
Description This is the competitive version of game, where there are at least two players and there is an outcome with a winner and loser.
Closest FrameNet Frame(s)
Maps to IARPA Source Concept(s)
